mapper.sql: file_id, file_user_id, file_parent_id, file_name, file_system_name, file_size, file_simple_size, file_type, file_ext,file_desc,file_quote, create_time, update_time, yn
mapper.select:
select
from c_d_file
ORDER by 1 desc

select
from c_d_file WHERE file_user_id = #{fileUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT} AND file_ext IN ('JPG','JPEG','PNG','GIF','jpg','jpeg','png','gif') AND yn = 1 AND file_type = 2 ORDER BY create_time DESC
